title.rendered: Team IMCD Group India volunteers for children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre

content.rendered: Together we can create a world where happiness is real! Thank you Team IMCD Group India for volunteering with children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre in Mumbai. In an engaging and well curated session, the employees shared their experiences with the children, enlightened them on various aspects of a healthy lifestyle focusing on nutrition, physical and mental health, as well as hygiene practices.
